page.title: 10LEISURE CENTRE ROTHERHAM
page.content: The Leisure Centre has a wide range of sport facilities.It has a swimming pool,there is also a set of squash courts,and badminton courts.There are other sports such as basketball,judo, and rollerskating.On Mondays,Tuesdays and Fridays there is gymnastics,which is held on four of the badminton courts.They have lots of equipment including assymetric bars and three trampets and lots of crash mats. At the roller-ring an attendant will ask what size skate you require and then she will get the size you want and give them to you .If you prefer you can bring your own skates or they will provide a pair of decent roller-skates with or without stoppers The price for all this is fifty three pence per person for about three to four hours and a juke box is also provided.
